summary: Implements pandas‑compatible indexing for Dask DataFrames, providing the .loc and .iloc accessors that interpret label, slice, list, array, and Series based selectors and translate them into partition‑aware retrieval operations while managing metadata and tokenization.
business_intent: Allow users to perform familiar, expressive row and column selections on large, distributed DataFrames without materializing the data, enabling scalable analytics that retain the lazy, parallel execution model of Dask.
